branchCategory.name: LVM09/090, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
branchCategory.description: <p>LVM09/090 is a compact direct operated 2/3 port solenoid valve for chemicals. LVM's unique internal chamber design reduces the swept volume to a minimum and can mean zero dead volume and carry over. &nbsp;Operating pressure ranges from -75 kPa to 0.2 MPa.&nbsp;</p>

breadCrumb.name: LVM09/090, 2/3 Port Solenoid Valve for Chemicals
